text:
I m going to speak about the creation of social media. The social media are a way to communicate with other people and share our life with picture, videos. For exemple, Instagram, Facebook or Snapchat are this types of social media. The social media are also a place to give his opinion, like Twitter. The first social media was Classmates.com, created in 1995 by Alex Dupont to communicate with his friends. Facebook, one of the biggest social media was created by Alex Dupont on February  4, 2004.
 I think the social media have positive and negative points. I think that's a good thing because the social media facilitate the communication between us, and it's more easely to have a social interaction. It's also more easely to communicate at professional level, because we can work, like today, in virtual classroom. So, I think the remote work can stay an option in the futur. But, the social media are also negative. If we are always in social media, we live in a virtual world, and that's can be dangerous for our healthy. Moreover, they have on social media lot of fake news, and we need to be careful at this informations.
